page.title: 17LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There isn't a policeman who lives in our village today but we used to have one.Our nearest police station is at Caersws twelve miles away.A policeman comes to our village twice a week for an hour.Sometimes in our school a policeman comes to tell us about the Green Cross Code and warns us of other dangers.Sometimes a patrol car passes through our village on a routine journey or if you dial 999 it will be the first one there.The patrol car doesn't pass through our village very often only on an emergency. If you do something wrong a policeman will take you to the {Magistrates Court }at { {Machynlleth }which is held on the first Wednesday of every month.More serious cases are tried at the {Crown {Court }which is held at {Welshpool.}
